name: BC Project Ruleset
description: Custom ruleset for Business Central project

rules.justification: There must be exactly one space character on each side of a binary operator.
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements.
Function calls should have parenthesis even if they do not have any parameters.
TextConst variable names should have approved suffix.
Do not declare variables that are unused.
Do not declare parameters that are unused.
Only use ASSERTERROR in Test Codeunits.
Only find record if you need to use it.
Do not use identical names for local and global variables.
Use Get(), FindFirst() and FindLast() without Next() method.
To avoid confusion, do not give local variables the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope.
The value assigned to a variable must be used.
StrSubstNo() or String Format() should not use placeholders that do not exist in the text.
